title: Unified inbox email forwarding sets wrong sender, not the one who received the message
content:
Since I am having 10+ e-mail accounts in a TB 115.16.0esr (latest stable on Debian 12), I am using Unified Inbox where i can read all received mail under one "folder". Though when I do it and right click received mail, select Forward as > attachment (or just Forward), then the Thunderbird wrongly sets different account of mine as a sender instead of the one which received the message.

I need to always bother checking this and switching (sometimes i forget and send from a wrong accoung, which is also a privacy issue), which is annoying and I am unsure if I have misconfigured the TB or how to fix this? Thank you
creator: postcd

title: Duplicates in sent box
content:
Hi,

All of a sudden I am gerring duplicates in my sent box. I've tried everything
creator: bluey40726

title: ricevo alcune mail che nel corpo del testo è presente solo un codice
content:
Buongiorno da un po di tempo alcune mail che ricevo presentano solo questo codice:

--_004_DU2P193MB20369E7C4F0B5C5CCD150983A2C3ADU2P193MB2036EURP_--

lo stesso codice in tutte le mail che non leggo ma aprendole su un altro pc le leggo bene

entrambi i pc usano la stessa relese

sapete dirmi cosa posso fare? grazie mille gianluca
creator: grafichegini

title: errore formattazione email
content: Buongiorno ad alcuni mie colleghi capita di non riuscire a visualizzare il contenuto delle mail che magari hanno letto 1 o 2 settimane fa(anche email più vecchie in alcuni casi), mentre questo non accade da webmail, al posto dell'errore visualizzo soltanto un striscia alfanumerica qualcuno ha idea di cosa potrebbe essere? usiamo imap come configurazione
creator: tosoni.alessio

title: Deletion of email messages so slow
content:
I am new to TB, I am based in the UK,.

My OS for now is Win 10 Pro, for years I have been receiving/sending my emails via " Windows Live Mail " but this will no longer be supported in upcoming Windows Upgrades.

I downloaded and set up TB, version 128.3.2esr 64bit and pretty much got it behaving as Live Mail did, my email account is POP3 protocol.

Some issues, the first, bulk deletion of unwanted emails.

I selected 80 emails for deletion/trashing, clicked the Trash icon, it took 42 minutes to complete, this cannot be right, I tried the compacting option which had no effect on speeding things up.

Trashing one email, its ok, three or over and the process is very slow.

How do I resolve this please?
creator: tafos7

title: E-Mails
content:
Since Oct. 17, some of the incoming E-Mails can not be read anymore. Instead of the content of the mail, only the following text is shown: --Apple-Mail-C1D158F0-2B70-4FE1-A389-A26C8D62912C--

--Apple-Mail-4EFFD56D-3C0F-40FB-BD17-52497B1FE98C--

see also below in the attachment!

Can you please help me to solve the problem?
